metadata.title: International cooperation on education - Inteli - Institute of Technology and Leadership

content_blocks.text: We are a pioneering institution created by André Esteves and Roberto Sallouti, both partners at BTG Pactual, Latin America's largest investment bank, with a bold mission: to empower the next generation of tech and business leaders in Brazil and the world.

WE BELIEVE TALENT IS EVERYWHERE - BUT OPPORTUNITY
IS NOT
content_blocks.subsection:
WE BELIEVE TALENT IS EVERYWHERE - BUT OPPORTUNITY
IS NOT

content_blocks.text: At Inteli, we are bridging that gap through real-world, high-impact, and purpose-driven education. 100% project-based learning Real challenges from leading companies Strong focus on leadership and soft skills Global mindset, local action
content_blocks.subsection:
WE BELIEVE TALENT IS EVERYWHERE - BUT OPPORTUNITY
IS NOT

content_blocks.text: We work hand-in-hand with top-tier companies to deliver real-world challenges and internships for our students:

We don't just teach technology-we teach how to lead with it. Our courses are built around real-world challenges from top companies, using a project-based learning (PBL) methodology, where students design full prototypes, pitch to executives, and develop essential skills in collaboration, leadership, and execution.

OUR PILLARS:

- Learning through projects:All subjects are integrated into multidisciplinary, real-world challenges.
- Technical depth and business fluency:Students master computing, business, and leadership simultaneously.
- Soft skills and leadership:Focus on collaboration, communication, creativity, and emotional intelligence.

INTELI'S STRUCTURE TO SUPPORT LEARNING
AND GROWTH
content_blocks.subsection:
INTELI'S STRUCTURE TO SUPPORT LEARNING
AND GROWTH

content_blocks.text: The bridge between students and companies. Responsible for bringing real-life business challenges into the classroom and managing over 100+ partnerships.
A dynamic career center that supports students from day one with:

A dynamic career center that supports students from day one with:

- Individual coaching for career and personal growth
- Soft skills development to enhance communication and teamwork
- Internship and career workshops to prepare for the job market
- Mental health support for student well-being
- International readiness programs for global career opportunities
Helps students turn ideas into startups through mentoring, investment connections, and incubation.
Get to know some among many of the student organizations that help shape our innovative and inclusive campus culture:
By experiencing the corporate environment, I clearly saw how the knowledge acquired in my classes was fundamental to my professional development". Kathlyn DiwanInteli student andAmazon intern

In my first semester of college, me and some friends from Inteli were fortunate enough to take part in a summer internship at BTG Pactual. I've never learned so much in just one month". Vitor ZeferinoInteli student

Executive Programs:

- AI for Business
- Data Science for Business Leaders
- Custom-made programs for professionals and international executives seeking upskilling in tech
LOCATED IN THE HEART OF SÃO PAULO, BRAZIL
content_blocks.subsection: LOCATED IN THE HEART OF SÃO PAULO, BRAZIL

content_blocks.text: São Paulo is not just a city -it's LatinAmerica's innovation capital.Home to over 20 million people, São Paulo hosts the region's largest tech hub, with unicorn startups, global HQs, VCs, accelerators, and creative labs.
content_blocks.subsection: LOCATED IN THE HEART OF SÃO PAULO, BRAZIL

content_blocks.text: Why bring your students to São Paulo?
content_blocks.subsection: Why bring your students to São Paulo?

content_blocks.text:
Why bring your students to São Paulo?

- A city that never stops
- Innovation, diversity, culture and business in one place
- International airport with daily flights to major cities around the world
- A multicultural, cosmopolitan experience unlike any other in South America
content_blocks.subsection: Why bring your students to São Paulo?

content_blocks.text: A PLACE FOR CREATIVITY, CONNECTION, AND COLLABORATION.
content_blocks.subsection: A PLACE FOR CREATIVITY, CONNECTION, AND COLLABORATION.

content_blocks.text:
A PLACE FOR CREATIVITY, CONNECTION, AND COLLABORATION.

- Active learning classrooms
- Makerspace
- Auditorium and meeting rooms
- Study and collaboration spaces
- Cafeteria, gym, music and wellness rooms
- Outdoor areas and bike storage
content_blocks.subsection: A PLACE FOR CREATIVITY, CONNECTION, AND COLLABORATION.

content_blocks.text: We're open to building win-win academic collaborations with universities worldwide.

We're open to building win-win academic collaborations with universities worldwide.

- Exchange Programs
- Faculty Collaboration(joint research, lectures, innovation labs)
- Custom Modules(Summer School, Hackathons, Innovation Bootcamps in Brazil)
- Double degree

What We Offer to Partners

- Full integration into our PBL methodology
- Access to our partner network (corporate & academic)
- Cultural immersion in São Paulo
- Housing program, onboarding and student support

Officially accredited as a Science, Technology, and Innovation Institution (ICT)through theCATI (Information Technology Area Committee)certification, granted by theMCTI (Ministry of Science, Technology and Innovation).
